text: The 1959 South Australian National Football League season was the 80th season of the top-level Australian rules football competition in South Australia. By winning the 1959 SANFL Grand Final, Port Adelaide set the Australian record of six consecutive Grand Final victories in a top level state competition when it defeated West Adelaide by 10 points. ==Ladder== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size: 90%; width: 60%" |- | colspan="10" style="background: #EBEBEB;" | {| border="0" width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" |- style="background: #EBEBEB;" | width="25%" style="border: 0;" | | style="border: 0; font-size: 115%;" | 1959 SANFL Ladder | width="25%" style="border: 0;" | |} |- style="text-align: center; font-size: 90%;" ! !!
